mapper.select: select pay_month, sum(inv_aft_tax) AS revenue from test_invoice GROUP BY pay_month ORDER BY pay_month ASC;
select pay_year, pay_month, sum(inv_aft_tax) AS revenue from test_invoice GROUP BY pay_month, pay_year ORDER BY pay_year, pay_month ASC;
select pay_year, sum(inv_aft_tax) AS revenue from test_invoice GROUP BY pay_year;
select pay_year, sum(inv_aft_tax) AS revenue from test_invoice GROUP BY pay_year;
select pay_year, pay_month, (count(rsv_num)) AS cnt from test_invoice GROUP BY pay_month, pay_year ORDER BY pay_year, pay_month ASC;
select place_maincate, (count(place_maincate)) as cnt from test_invoice where pay_year = #{payYear} group by place_maincate order by cnt desc;
